name: WINKNewsDailyUpdate
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
As the leading news provider in Southwest Florida, WINK NEWS is committed to keeping you safe and well-informed. With our Flash Briefing skill, you'll receive timely and relevant updates on a wide range of topics, including weather, breaking news, and more.

Here's what you can expect from the WINK NEWS Southwest Florida Flash Briefing skill:

Breaking News Updates: Get the most recent breaking news stories from across Southwest Florida delivered directly to your Alexa device. 

Weather Reports: Stay ahead of the weather with up-to-the-minute forecasts, severe weather alerts, and storm updates. WINK NEWS is dedicated to providing accurate and reliable weather information, ensuring you are prepared for any weather conditions.

Local Updates: Stay connected with your community through updates on local news that matter to you.

To enable the WINK NEWS Southwest Florida Flash Briefing skill, simply say, "Alexa, enable WINK NEWS Southwest Florida Flash Briefing." Once enabled, you can listen to the latest news by saying, "Alexa, play my Flash Briefing."

Count on WINK NEWS, Southwest Florida's number one news leader, to keep you informed and connected. Stay updated with the WINK NEWS Southwest Florida Flash Briefing skill and experience the power of local news at your fingertips.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
